nodes.text: The Halla sector was a sector located within the Mid Rim. It included the planets of  Bimmisaari and Danuta.

Shortly after the Declaration of a New Order, a Moff based on Bimmisaari was responsible for an area known as Sector 3, which seems to have included at least parts of both the Halla and Mytaranor sectors, since it extended as far as Kashyyyk.
